text:
01 of 26 Elizabeth Messina “I keep staring at him,” Lauren Conrad told PEOPLE of her son William "Liam" Tell, born on July 5, 2017 (dad is her husband, William Tell). “His little face is so cute. I keep telling him, ‘No one will ever love you like I do!’ ”

02 of 26 Elizabeth Messina “He’s sort of a combo of both of us,” said Conrad of her son. “He definitely looks like William, but he’s still so tiny it’s hard to tell!”

03 of 26 Elizabeth Messina Following Liam's birth, the new mom was easing back into work on her LC Lauren Conrad collection for Kohl’s and her clothing line Paper Crown. (She’s also cofounder of nonprofit the Little Market.) “I like to be busy,” she said. “I think it’s good to have balance.”

04 of 26 Elizabeth Messina Conrad hand-stitched the birth announcement that she posted on her Web site, laurenconrad.com.

05 of 26 Elizabeth Messina "I just remember thinking he was so cute," Conrad said of meeting her son for the first time post-delivery. "And I was surprised by how tiny he was. I was convinced I was having a giant baby, to the point where I didn’t even buy newborn clothes. In my head he was 9 lbs., and I thought that’s why delivery hurt so much!"

06 of 26 Elizabeth Messina "I had no baby experience. I had never held a newborn, and I just changed my first diaper the other day," she said of transitioning into motherhood. "But I figured it out quickly. The idea of it is so much scarier than the reality."

07 of 26 Elizabeth Messina Conrad wove this personalized wall hanging on a loom for her son’s “neutral and calm” nursery. “We’ll pick a theme for the room once we know what he likes,” she said.

08 of 26 Elizabeth Messina "I always hoped I would have a boy. I was a tomboy, and I always play best with boys. When we found out, I was so excited," Conrad shared of finding out the baby's sex before he was born.

09 of 26 Elizabeth Messina “I got really into knitting while I was pregnant,” said Conrad.

10 of 26 Elizabeth Messina “I grew up on the sand, so I’m excited to take him to the beach,” said Conrad. “I think William and I will each teach him different things. And we get to do all the fun kid things again! It’s so nice. There is so much to look forward to.”

11 of 26 Lauren Conrad/Instagram On Oct. 1, 2017, Conrad shared a shot of her snoozing sweetie on Instagram. "Sunday snuggles with this little guy," she captioned the dreamy pic.

12 of 26 Lauren Conrad/Instagram Lauren had a little lamb! On Oct. 12, 2017, the former reality star took her 3-month-old on his first trip to the pumpkin patch.

13 of 26 Lauren Conrad/Instagram Little Liam was front and center of family's adorable 2017 Christmas card.

14 of 26 Lauren Conrad/Instagram Even though we couldn't see his face, Liam was pretty darn cute in his 6-month photo — which Mom stole with her cheeky Hills-related shirt.

15 of 26 Lauren Conrad/Instagram Another holiday, another milestone for Liam, who hung happily with the Easter Bunny.

16 of 26 Lauren Conrad/Instagram; JB Lacroix/ Getty Images Dad was a guitarist, maybe Liam will be, too? The 8-month-old showed off his musical inclination in another sentimental snap from Mom.

17 of 26 Lauren Conrad/Instagram; Inset: JB Lacroix/ Getty You talkin' to me? The 9-month-old was mom Lauren's inquisitive dinner date in April 2018.

18 of 26 Lauren Conrad/Instagram Conrad's Father's Day tribute to her husband came with a bonus: a pic of Liam venturing into the water!

19 of 26 Lauren Conrad/Instagram "Visiting Grandma's foster puppies" turned into pretty much the cutest picture ever in September 2018.

20 of 26 Lauren Conrad/Instagram "This little pumpkin is growing up so fast!" Conrad wrote of the family's annual visit to the pumpkin patch.

21 of 26 Lauren Conrad/Instagram All dressed up with somewhere to go! Conrad and her son donned Peter Pan and Captain Hook costumes for his first visit to Disneyland in October 2018.

22 of 26 Lauren Conrad/Instagram Speaking of costumes ... Conrad debuted hers on Instagram a few days before Halloween 2018, dressing as Melanie Daniels from the Hitchcock classic The Birds and putting Liam in a bird ensemble of his own.

23 of 26 "Feeling pretty thankful for these two (and pie) today," Conrad wrote on Thanksgiving 2018. "Wishing everyone a wonderful Thanksgiving!"

24 of 26 The cutest Santa's little helper there ever was, just before Christmas 2018.

25 of 26 Lauren Conrad/Instagram On a February 2019 day off, Conrad took "this little dude" to the zoo.

Aili Nahas Is The Former West Coast Deputy News Director At People. She Left People In
title: 26 Completely Adorable Photos of Lauren Conrad's Son Liam

meta_data.description: With news Conrad and husband William Tell are expecting baby No. 2, take a look at their son's sweetest moments
